summary: Innovation focuses on envisioning a future where both humanity and the planet benefit from advances in various fields. With an emphasis on transforming education, improving environmental practices, and addressing inequalities, the concept of innovation in this context involves creating resilient ecosystems through decentralized and regenerative designs. It aims to foster thriving communities interconnected by shared knowledge, prioritizing sustainable development and holistic growth.
excerpt: An exploration of how decentralized and regenerative designs can reshape innovation to enhance both humanity and the planet, transforming education, environmental practices, and addressing inequalities.
